explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions developing a machine learning model to predict extended length of stay (eLOS) in patients with spinal deformity.
explanations.classification: The model predicts whether a patient will have an extended length of stay (eLOS >7 days), which is a binary classification problem.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions using logistic regression, a type of regression model, to develop the predictive model.
